Package Utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    This class allows for animations to be made using Image2D's.
    Circle
    A useful class for collision detection.
    Cutscene  
    FontStyle  
    FontType  
    Image2D
    A Class which holds a sprite, and can draw it.
    ImageCollection
    Holds images for a game.
    InputAdvance
    Advance version of the Input class.
    InputBasic
    Basic version of the Input class.
    KeyBoard
    A Class which can hold the state of the Keyboard at the current instant.
    keyChars
    A collection of characters, used for keyboard input.
    Mouse
    A class which holds the state of the mouse at any instant.
    Rect
    An extension of the Rectangle class.
    Sound  
    SoundBatch  
    SoundFile  
    Vector2
    A useful class with an X, Y and length.
    Vector3  
    ViewScreen
    A "window" into the game world.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Mouse.Buttons
    Buttons the Mouse has.
    Mouse.WheelType
    The value type for the Scrolling event.
